knimeNode.name: Compare Segments
knimeNode.shortDescription: Compares two tables of segments (binary image masks) according to how many relativ pixels they have in common. Hence the actual segment shape AND the offset (minimum) of the bitmasks are considered. NOTE that the sources of the bitmasks have to be the same! A column with the maximum relative pixel aggreement with respect to the reference segments is appended to the target column.

fullDescription.intro: Compares two tables of segments (binary images) according to how many relativ pixels they have in common (Number of the pixels of the intersection divided by the number of pixels of the union (IoU)). Hence the actual segment shape AND the offset (minimum) of the bitmasks are considered. NOTE that the sources of the bitmasks have to be the same! A column with the relative pixel aggreement with respect to the reference segments is appended to the target column. Also, optionally, the number of overlaps and a collection of all overlapping row keys of the overlapping segments are appended.
fullDescription.option: Appends the number of overlapping segments of the reference table.

option.name: Append row keys of overlapping segments

fullDescription.option: Appends the row keys of the overlapping segments of the reference table.

ports.inPort: The segments whose maximum pixel aggreement with respect to the reference segments will be calculated.
ports.outPort: The target segment table with three additional columns.
